message.comment: Match ends, Celtic 4, Kilmarnock 0.
Second Half ends, Celtic 4, Kilmarnock 0.
Goal! Celtic 4, Kilmarnock 0. Arne Engels (Celtic) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty Celtic. Yang Hyun-Jun draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by James Brown (Kilmarnock) after a foul in the penalty area.
Fourth official has announced 2 minutes of added time.
Corner, Kilmarnock. Conceded by Kieran Tierney.
Attempt missed. Yang Hyun-Jun (Celtic) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Reo Hatate.
Attempt saved. Daizen Maeda (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal by Eddie Beach (Kilmarnock). Assisted by Anthony Ralston with a through ball.
Goal! Celtic 3, Kilmarnock 0. Daizen Maeda (Celtic) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Arne Engels with a through ball.
Corner, Kilmarnock. Conceded by Auston Trusty.
Foul by Benjamin Nygren (Celtic).
Liam Polworth (Kilmarnock) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Greg Kiltie (Kilmarnock) is shown the yellow card.
Substitution, Kilmarnock. Liam Polworth replaces David Watson.
Substitution, Kilmarnock. Marley Watkins replaces Brad Lyons.
Substitution, Celtic. Yang Hyun-Jun replaces Sebastian Tounekti.
Substitution, Celtic. Arne Engels replaces Johnny Kenny.
Daizen Maeda (Celtic) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Daizen Maeda (Celtic).
James Brown (Kilmarnock) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Johnny Kenny (Celtic) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Anthony Ralston with a cross.
Foul by Reo Hatate (Celtic).
Greg Kiltie (Kilmarnock) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Marcus Dackers (Kilmarnock) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Dominic Thompson with a cross following a fast break.
Offside, Kilmarnock. James Brown is caught offside.
Callum McGregor (Celtic) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Callum McGregor (Celtic).
Greg Kiltie (Kilmarnock) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Reo Hatate (Celtic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by David Watson (Kilmarnock).
Corner, Kilmarnock. Conceded by Kieran Tierney.
Foul by Daizen Maeda (Celtic).

Substitution, Kilmarnock. Tyreece John-Jules replaces Scott Tiffoney.
Substitution, Kilmarnock. Greg Kiltie replaces Tom Lowery.
Attempt blocked. Benjamin Nygren (Celtic) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Reo Hatate.
Substitution, Celtic. Anthony Ralston replaces Jahmai Simpson-Pusey.
Substitution, Celtic. Benjamin Nygren replaces Luke McCowan.
Brad Lyons (Kilmarnock) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

James Brown (Kilmarnock) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal! Celtic 2, Kilmarnock 0. Kieran Tierney (Celtic) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Liam Scales.
Foul by Liam Scales (Celtic).
Scott Tiffoney (Kilmarnock) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Daizen Maeda (Celtic) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Luke McCowan with a cross following a corner.
Corner, Celtic. Conceded by Tom Lowery.
Second Half begins Celtic 1, Kilmarnock 0.
First Half ends, Celtic 1, Kilmarnock 0.
Corner, Celtic. Conceded by Zac Williams.
Corner, Celtic. Conceded by Dominic Thompson.
